name: Hera
skill: Increase DMG dealt by 3 allies (melee priority) by 28%/35% for a limited time.
ability: Moderately restores HP to skill targets.

additional_data.description: The spirit of the goddess of marriage, motherhood and chastity. She's bothered by her husband's freewheeling behavior, and consequently their marriage has numerous problems. But it never completely falls apart thanks in large part to her tolerance. There are rumors that she arranged for a special familiar to keep an eye on him at all times, but she shrugs off such false accusations with a broad smile. Because they're definitely false and not true in any way. Ahem.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "Romance of the Demon and Sword" Event: Defeat Lv. 60, 70, 140, 180 Noddy.
◦ "Romance of the Demon and Sword" Event: Random drops after LVL 60.
◦ "Romance of the Demon and Sword" Get a Second Half Ranking of 1000 and above.
◦ "Romance of the Demon and Sword" Get a Second Half Ranking of 2501~6000.
◦ "Romance of the Demon and Sword" Get a Total Ranking of 7500 and above.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia: ◦ Slightly increases total Event Points gained during the "Romance of the Demon and Sword" event.

main: "My husband should be here any minute..."
summon: "You wouldn't happen to be providing cover for my husband, would you?"
limit_break: "Now I will be more beautiful than any other woman."
